video_title: How are ADHD and Trauma Connected? @patrickteahanofficial #adhd #adhdawarenessmonth
transcript:
I've had many clients come to me that
when I start working with them the first
thing they start talking about is
bullies in the school system when they
think about being traumatized that's the
first place that their their brain goes
to and from what I do as a clinician I'm
thinking about how did your parents help
you with that then I'm starting to poke
around about the trauma at home with it
so absolutely I also think about you
know ASD and other neurode Divergent
kind of kids um it's just really a
brutal disaster for them in a
neurotypical world so there's lots of
trauma that comes from from that and I
think
